title.narrative: LEADING FROM THE SOUTH -MONITORING, EVALUATION AND LEARNING 2020

description.narrative: Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning activities undertaken to support AWDF's work as well as its grantees under the LFS initiative year four(4)
To support AWDF and its partners with better means of learning from past experiences, improving performance, planning and allocating resources and demonstrating results as part of accountability.
AWDF and grantees supported under the LFS initiative in Africa and the Middle East.

activity-date.narrative: The date indicated above signifies the start of activities under the LFS initiative- year four (4)
The date indicated above signifies the scheduled end date for the four-year LFS initiative.

description.narrative:
Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning as well as travel-related expenses under the LFS initiative year four for the period from January to March 2020.
There were no Monitoring and Evaluation related expenditure in the 2nd quarter of 2020 (April- June) due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
There were no Monitoring and Evaluation related expenditure in the 3rd quarter of 2020 (July- September) due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
